meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I can keep up in my education
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Aaron, a third-year student majoring in Education. I’ve taken a lot of interesting courses, from history to education policy to teaching methods. But even though I’ve done well academically, I’ve started to feel like I’m not quite fitting in or understanding what I’m doing. I’m not sure if I should be in the education major or if I should switch to something else, but I’m worried I’m falling behind and not doing well enough to graduate on time. I’m also struggling with personal essays and feeling like I don’t have a strong voice as a student. I’d love to talk with someone about how to stay on track and feel more confident in my education.
